00003 MEM_LOC initial_esp = 0;

00006 int exit(int val)
00007 {
00008         MEM_LOC mebp = initial_ebp;
00009         MEM_LOC mesp = initial_esp;
00010 
00011         asm volatile("mov %0, %%ebp; \
